The variety of public and private stakeholders and rightsholders in the Gaviota Region provides the opportunity to identify shared conservation goals, from biodiversity and habitat conservation to agricultural land use.

This planner allows you to [**select predefined weights that represent the priorities of the regional actors**]{.underline}. The weights are the result of an Analytic Hierarchy Process analysis that we conducted using the responses obtained from surveying 21 regional organizations. We calculated and scaled the aggregated preferences by organization type based on their self-identification in the survey.

Essentially, this option allows you to [**see the areas that each type of organization prioritizes based on the resources they value the most**]{.underline}.
